journal.name: Rate your knowledge: What do you know about SCL?
journal.intro:
Tell us what you know about student-centered learning (SCL). Add a journal entry (about 3 sentences) of your understanding of SCL and tell us if you consider yourself a...

  • SCL expert: You apply the principles in your teaching every day;
  • SCL novice: You consider the principles and are learning more about the framework;
  • SCL newbie: The term SCL and its guidelines are still new to you.

Back
